content.detailedDescription: At 9:35 my wife was in the hot tub and i was in the suana outside right next to the hot tub when she yelled for me to come out. she saw a white 80' long pencil/rocket shaped oject with rocket type fins on the back flying approx. 80' overhead and directly over her. it was going north to south at approx. 25 mph. i came out and missed seeing it right when she lost sight of it. as she was freaked out and telling me about it, i was looking up and saw a light red diamond shaped craft about the size of an f16 taking the exact same flight path as hers and the same height and speed. i could not get her to look up in time to see it as she was too excited about what she saw. i watched it go out of sight. both craft were completely silent, very low, no lights, and flew directly over our hot tub. this is the 3rd different shaped craft that has flown over our hot tub in 4 nights.  on sunday night 10/24 we both saw a boomerang shaped craft take the exact same path over us. we do not understand how or why this is happening to us...
content.summary: Close sighting of 2 different shaped craft 20 seconds apart in the same spot

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly before 8pm et, i pulled into my driveway and stopped the car so my husband could get the mail. he got out, closed the door, and walked to the mailbox, which is on a post at the intersection of our driveway and our road, on the passenger side of the car. i hit the button to roll down my window, and looked up to watch it come down so i could stop it part way (it's chilly out). when i looked up, it was right there. 

it was either huge or really close, and positioned just north of my car (car was facing east). it was an incredibly bright, pure, solid white light in the shape of a triangle and it was in the process of rapidly increasing in intensity. like quickly turning up a rheostat, which gave me the impression that it was growing brighter and larger. my brain was screaming helicopter, but there was no sound but the bawling of the neighbors cattle, and nothing but that solid white triangular light. life flight goes by here all the time, so i know what that looks and sounds like. i knew better. i immediately screamed for my husband to look up, as i was leaping out of the car. 

by the time i got out of the car, it had dimmed and decreased slightly in size. as it quickly floated away, it lost it's triangular shape and became a fuzzy ball. it headed north, running parallel with our road. then it stopped a few fingers above the northern horizon line. 

my 12 year old daughter exited the back seat on the passenger side and ran around the car to see what was going on because i was out of the car and still calling my husband's name. she came and stood beside me, she was frightened because i was yelling and pointing.

she witnessed a ball of shiny white light that looked fuzzy in the middle. it was stationary then began moving back towards us just as my husband arrived. (he had been looking in the mailbox with a flashlight and missed the entire thing. it had to have flown right over his head). it pulsed a few times then started moving away again, a few seconds later it moved up and to the right and became stationary. my daughter saw it flash red three times while it was moving up and to the right. i did not see this. 

sadly, my husband has poor vision from cataract surgery, wears bifocals, and never saw anything. please note that my daughter has perfect vision, and that i wear glasses for astigmatism with a crizal antiscratch coating, which i was wearing at the time of the sighting. 

the object was close to the horizon and we have ambient light issues from the neighboring town to the northeast, so it appeared to fade in and out of existence. we believe that at some point it actually disappeared and we started seeing dubhe, as the big dipper was just starting to rise. this entire incident took place in a very short time, approximately 5-10 minutes, but felt like a lifetime.

my husband pulled the car down to the bottom of the drive while my daughter and i walked home. it's about 180 feet from the top of the drive to where we park our car. my husband and daughter went up to the house, i stayed outside for a while to see if anything else appeared, then also went to the house. 

after pulling myself together i decided to write this report. a few notes...

this was not a plane. we are on the pit-ord flightpath so we see a lot of air traffic. we also see some new york and cle traffic to the north. there are 2 small airfields within 10 miles of the house. we are also frequently buzzed by transports from the youngstown air reserve station in vienna. the ravenna army ammunition plant is about 30 miles north west of us.
there was actually quite a bit of normal air traffic during the sighting. 

this was not a meteor, we watch the perseids every year. this object moved with control and intent. it did have the radiance, but not the tail, of an earth grazer, which i have seen.

this was a solid triangular shaped light, not 3 lights in a triangular formation.

a few cars passed us while this was happening. it was early in the evening. please, if you saw this thing, file a report. 

thank you for your time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I looked up in the night sky and saw a bright, solid pure white light in the shape of a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were on a walk down caves springs rd off of highway 53. first we saw a really bright light above the treeline. at first it looked like it was not moving. then it started to fly right over our heads not to far up in the sky. we saw three lights in a triangular shape,two white and one red. after it flew behind us it started to go back up into the sky with increasing speed. no sound at all.
content.summary: On a walk down caves springs rd off of highway 53. saw three lights in a triangular shape. two white and one red. it flew over are heads.

content.detailedDescription: Saw ufo
content.summary: Saw ufo

content.detailedDescription: Same as the 3 red orbs, these photos just show that it was 1 pulsating orb at one time and 2 at another time
content.summary: Same red pulsating orbs, but a single orb photo

content.detailedDescription: Pulsating red orbs in a triangle position were hovering over our home, making no noise. the orbs would fade in and out of the clouds.  i attached 3 pictures to give an idea of the brightness of them.  it wasnt a plane because it wasnt moving forward, it just hovered over the house.  in all photos you can see the same branch of the tree i was under.  these pictures were taken over a 2 hour time period.
content.summary: Pulsating red orbs in a triangle position.

content.detailedDescription: Looked over my neighbors house and noticed a bright light off in the distance.  went grab my camcorder and zoomed in on it, it was just hovering there like 2 headlights of a car just staring back at me.  it hovered back and forth for about 5 minutes.  at about the 3 minute mark into the video the craft then swtiched from 2 main headlights, to an offset 3rd light just as bright as the other 2.  the craft then slowly drifted to the right and then it tilted to a slight angle and drifted off to the right.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Lake erie similar ufo was hovering over wetlands in louisiana

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i flew from san francisco to atlanta for a family visit. about an hour or so into the flight (1:40pm pst) my girlfriend, who was sitting in the window seat, was talking to me about something. i was sitting right next to her in the aisle seat feigning to listen when a bright object passed from the right to the left of the plane window. it caught my eye immediately because i was turned toward her and staring out the window as she talked away. i immediately asked out loud, "what the hell is that?" she looked too and we both sat and watched the object "fly" by the plane for about 10 seconds until the tiny window obstructed our view. we even wrenched our necks and pushed our faces into the window to keep it in view. we then turned to each other and asked what we just saw. we both said exactly the same thing. a whitish, greyish metallic disc flew by our window. it had no wings, no tail, no windows, no markings, no trail and no lights. it seemed completely smooth all around except there might have been a slight ridge running along the bottom of the disc. instead of the classic cliche disc which tends to look like two frisbees stacked together, it appeared to us as only one large frisbee with the rounded top, tapering down on either side into a flattish bottom. it was in the middle of the day, it was sunny, the sky was completely clear, and we were above the clouds. the stewardess told us we were at approx 14,400 feet. the only discrepancy in each of our descriptions is that i felt as if it "flew" by us in the opposite direction while she felt it could have been sitting still as we flew by it. a potentially interesting note is that before and after the "sighting" we commented aloud on how many airplanes there were in the sky that day. there were seemingly tons of them, everywhere, some close and some far. i mention this because the thing we could not decide on was how close the object was to our plane and hence its size. we really didn't have a reference, except that even the planes that passed the furthest from us, way out there, we could still clearly see that they had wings and tails.

shortly after, i wrote a note on a piece of paper and handed it to a stewardess to hand to the captain. it said:

captain,

about 10 mins ago (roughly 1:40pm pacific time) my girlfriend and i witnessed some kind of craft flying past us on the left side of our plane. we thought it could have been a plane, but it didn't look like it had any wings or tail. honestly it looked like a greyish, white reflective disc. did you see it? was it a plane?

thank you,
seat 30b

after reading my note to the captain over a cockpit phone or whatever it was (she said for security reasons she couldn't just walk in), the captain said he was reading a magazine so he didn't see anything but he did say, based on the time, it was no plane.
content.summary: We were flying from san francisco to atlanta and about an hour or so into the flight my girlfriend and i both saw an off-white, grayish metallic looking disc pass by us through the airplane window. it was in our sights for no more than 10 secs.

content.detailedDescription: I heard the dogs around my house going crazy barking, last night about 9:20 p.M. pacific standard, in leimert park california. my dog started whining and barking so i let him out and went out to see what they were barking at. at that moment something went slowly over my house, not too high up a little higher than the rootops not high like airplanes, it made no noise whatsoever at all and the dogs were going crazy. it was dark, so i couldn't see it all completely all i could see were the three triangles on the back but i think it was like a long flat rectangle shape, kind of like back lights on a car, but they had little bulbs on the triangle part with red and white alternating lights..Then i could see these two circular things on the bottom, probably like jet engines or something...Anyway it went slowly over the house, i ran back in to get my phone to take a pic but by then it was out of focus. i stood there wondering if i really saw what i had just seen, i am not sure what the heck it was but i have never ever seen anything like that before. why were the dogs going nuts? we have a lot of "scramblers" that go over this area, it's a known drug part of town within blocks of me. i will be watching the tv and it will scramble when the helicopters go over, but this was not a helicopter, it made no sound whatsoever. when i first noticed it, i was sure it wasn't anything i had ever seen before, i called my neighbor to come out, but he was late getting there, he said i could tell on your face u saw something...Just the look on it. i don't know what i thought it was. i have no idea. just weird. it just went straight over my house in a straight line, very slow toward the east. after seeing it i was scared, wasn't sure what it was and what it meant that i saw it. just disbelief in what i saw in general. i lost sight of the object as it disappeared over the roof of a house in the distance.
content.summary: All i saw were the three triangles w/ red/white lights, and two circular things on bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
I was conducting a land survey when i noticed the object today (oct. 27/10) between 10-10:30am and which was viewed flying north from my position on grove road, about 1-2 miles north of rt. 126. the object caught my eye because it seemed to be moving rather fast, and it also made no sound whatsoever. it seemed odd for some reason, so i attempted to take a couple of photos of it. i had trouble finding it in the view master of the camera because of the time of day, and also trying to find something so small is like the proverbial needle in a haystack. anyways, i later loaded the photos onto my computer. 
 
  at first i thought i had totally missed it, but then on one shot, i saw that i did indeed capture it. it is not a great shot, but it may still prove important. it is a white cylindrical object just above the tips of the leaves on the trees near the lower middle portion of the frame. when magnified, the object appears to be mainly white with a dark band around its middle and one end dark. in the direction of travel, the dark tip is leading the rest of the craft. but most important of all, it appears to have no wings at all. although it was an exceptionally windy day out there today, this was not floating debris. i had watched the thing fly in a perfectly level (from my vantage point) tragectory for several seconds, an impossibility if it was a floating piece of paper or a bag of some kind. i eventually lost sight of the object against the blue sky and the brightness of the day.
content.summary: White, dark coloration, cylindrical, no wings, no sound,

that connect each other.This event was from 7;25p.M. to 7;32p.M. look like rounded and shiny complete no noise and moving very show.They were doing an observation on me.Because i am part of they.
    second object ufo after i move to a different location.I see a another object at high  altitude move from west to south east at 7;53p.M. to 7;55p.M.This one pass near by a strong lightning  storm. 
this object moving in straight line. like the first one no sound and no smoke or fire left behind.
     third object ufo .I was located at same location of the second object time 8;01 p.M.To 8;04 p.M .Very high altitude and hard to seem. moving from north to south in zigzag movement. also close to the big lightning storm. this one disappear on the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Walk outside to have a smoke on deck.
moon had not come up yet so it was very dark and good time to watch the stars. 
noticed a what can only be described as a star way moving nw to se in the sky. no blinking lights..Figured hey i get to see a satellite but this thing was moving very very fast. well across 3/4 of my view of skyline above the trees this object changed course and headed ne.  i'm talking turn on a dime. after this nothing else happened. only wish i had my camera.  never seen anything like this in my life.
content.summary: Moving star high in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I take the dog out every morning before work. i generally look at the sky to see if it is cloudy, etc. this morning when i looked up, i immediately saw 2 lights, at first i thought they were jets, heading west/southwest in a parallel formation. after watching, i saw many others, all headed the same direction. i thought that to be odd due to the fact that most jets don't normally fly in the same flight path. i tried counting them and stopped at around 25 lights. there was no noise, there were a few clouds that i could see. i did not loose site of these objects, i just took the dog back in and got ready for work. surely ft. campbell ( ky) or the nashville airport would have picked this up on radar i thought. i don't believe i have ever seen this sort of thing in my entire life.
content.summary: Over 25 bright lights, all moving in a westward direction.

content.detailedDescription: my wife and i were vacationing in hocking county, ohio on march 28,2009. we rented a cabin up on a ridge that looked down on a small valley. our cabin had several sky lights in the loft bedroom. it was a beautiful warm dark,clear night around 10:00 pm. we opened the  window in the loft bedroom and was settling in for the night. i was lying in bed looking thru the skylights while my wife got ready for bed. suddenly there was a flash of bright light with no sound. as i watched thru the skylight, a large, dark triangle object floated over the cabin with lights underneath the object.They were not landing lights of a plane. they appeared to be recessed lights and still no sound. i asked my wife if she saw the light.She stated that she saw a flash, but, was unsure what it was. she ran down the stairs and onto the deck at the rear of our cabin. she did not see anything unusual at that time. our neighbors in another cabin up the ridge had a dog.  we noticed that the dog was barking. then, all got quiet. we felt no fear at this time-just curious. we saw nothing on the area local news that weekend. however, upon returning home, my nephew ( who lives in central ohio) called to say that several strange lights were reported in southeastern ohio that night. we were watching ufo sightings on the t.V.  several months later and i saw the same triangle. i am unsure what to make of this encounter. however, i know what i saw that warm march night. as of this time, i have not viewed any thing of this nature since the first encounter.
content.summary: Triangle shaped lights under object dark in color very silent =no noise

content.detailedDescription: I was going northbound on i-5 on my way home from my boyfriend's house when at approximately 11:15pm(pst) the object appeared in the sky nw of where i was at the time. i thought it was a shooting star at first, but it had no tail. i've seen shooting stars before during meteor showers and this looked nothing like one. it stayed consistantly bright the whole 2 seconds that i saw it. it was just a single spherical white ball of light that was too fast to be a plane or helicopter, too bright and too big to be a satilite. it appeared out of no where. the sky was clear. it traveled in a straight path down towards the horizon then vanished. i had a strange mixture of fear and excitement overwhelm me as i continued driving. i was curious if anyone else might have reported it so i checked the mufon live map. the closest sighting was the one in redding,ca the same night(10-26-10)... 4 spherical white shapes only 45 min before my sighting. i thought this was an interesting coincidence.
content.summary: Going northbound on i-5 object appeared in nw sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I witnessed a black triangle in the sky on october 3rd, 2010, on a sunday. according to my notebook: "saw the black triangle moving slowly from south to north -- just east of us. wish i had my camera out there, and it did have the telephoto lens on it! it would have been so simple."

i do not believe these triangular types of ufos are extra-terrestrial, but i do know about skunk works, and all of the things the government experiments with there. this black triangle (an elongated triangle style) was most likely one of those.

just wish i had gotten that picture.

i was in my backyard on that sunday morning, and heard the sound of a jet.  we live not too far from an airport, so that is nothing unusual.  i enjoy watching the planes and jets flying overhead. it was high overcast clouds that morning.  i looked to the west where the sound was coming from, and then to the east, and saw the black triangle, and it was at quite a high altitude, but i could still see it was a black triangle.  i know the jet sound was not coming from it.  i did not see the jet the sound was coming from, but may have been out of sight because of trees.  the triangle was too high for making that much of a sound, anyway.  the black triangle moved very slowly in a straight line from south the north. it simply vanished into the distance, and took quite a while to disappear.  i thought about getting my camera, but was afraid it would disappear before i could get to it.
content.summary: Elongated triangle

content.detailedDescription: I will need quite a bit more time to provide a complete narrative, in part because i simply have too many other things to do today. please feel free to contact me by phone or email if i don't get back to you timely.
content.summary: Observed a large, bright silver object appear to drop vertically from bottom of a large lenticular cloud. no contrails seen. object  appeared to be tumbling uncontrollably from a great height.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on deck looking up into southern sky saw a star-like object that was moving & very bright.At first i thought it may have been a jet with a bright landing/headlight(although it was moving away from me) but there was no blinking lights at all,no sound,it was approx.5-10,000 ft & moving at a speed like a jet would into the southern sky.Wathched this for approx. 2-3 mins.All of a sudden it disappeared for 4-5 secs & then came back for a few secs still moving south,then it seemed to get about 10 times brighter & disappeared completely like it was being sucked up into the darkness.I don't think this was a meteor or a falling star-i've never seen one disappear going up.
content.summary: Bright star like

content.detailedDescription:
My wife an i have previously seen an unusual bright light in the sky from our upstairs bedroom window in the north-western sky, usually around two am. we've seen it periodically over a period of about three years but have not seen it for about a year.

at 02:30 am on october 27, 2010, our dog woke us indicating he needed to go outside - a very unusual occurence. i dressed and took him out on his leash. his behavior while outside was normal. as i walked from the back of the house to the front of the house along the sidewalk running along the east side, i saw a very unusual and very bright light in the western sky. it was motionless, appeared to be at quite a distance, but i could hear a perceptable though faint hum. my wife dressed and came out on the front porch and we watched it together. she characterized the noise as the faint sound of a vacuum cleaner. i watched it through binoculars. at one point it appeared to be a large lighted spherical object with a smaller spherical object in front that was unlit and positioned so as to occlude the view of part of the lighted object (similar to the appearance of a partial lunar eclipse). at another point, it appeared as two slightly out of round lighted sperical objects pressed together, one above the other in a figure 8 pattern. the object was at a bearing of approximately due west (270)and at an azimuth of 40 to 45 degrees above the horizon. it was significantly larger than the visible stars and about one fouth the sixe of a normal full moon. we returned to bed. a arose for woke and left the house at about 05:15 est. the object was no longer visible.

first, is there a record of any normal heavenly body visible from my area at the time and location that i described (ther was recent news report about alignment of jupiter and another planet - weeks back and reported to be visible in north western sky)?

second, i found your case 26105 and was intrigued by the similarities other than the time (0745 gmt vs 19:28 gmt).
content.summary: Bright white light in the western sky in a location where i'm not accustomed to seeing bright stars

content.detailedDescription:
It was full-moon. i had been to stonehenge to invoke magick and try to communicate with ancestors. spent the night on a line of ancient burial mounds trying to access information no longer available generally to human beings. there was a sharp frost and particles if ice in the air. i used a laser pen to scan the skys and the whole place was aglow as the laser light reflected off the water/ice particles in the atmosphere.I shone it parralel to the ground so that the beam skimmed the surface of the grass, swishing it rapidly left to right. this had an amazing affect as again the light was refracted by the frozen grass such that the field was alight over a vast area. in the sky the light seemed to re-appear from nowhere in isolated areas. a delayed reaction. my theory is that it was being bounced around from one ice particle to another before dissipating. i felt as though i was receiving information as i was saying things to my companion that i had no idea of origin. this was my goal. i wanted to tune in to information channels that hum,ans no longer have access to and was conscious of trying to open up my dormant brain to receive signals, information, lost secrets, anything that would help reverse the completely stupid direction chosen by men on earth. 

i had just returned to my car and was watching the sun rise over stonehenge. it was a fabulously clear morning and the full-moon was falling just as the sun was rising. it was around about the time that both appeared to be at the same level in the sky and facing each other that i saw the first ufo. at forst i thought it was the silver lining of a cloud, but it was moving towards the sun in a uniform length. i did not jump to the immediate conclusion that it was a ufo. i am extremely wary of doing so and figured that it was man controlled. then more started to appear heading in all different directions. it now seemed to me to be a phenomenon. i saw a sperical glow of light also which i took to be one of tyhese objects coming at me head on so i guess they must be cylindrical in shape unless part of the vision is a vapour trail of fixed length and duration.

all of the objects travelled at a uniform speed in a continuous fashion such that would be expected from an airoplane etc. i do not actually recall seeing any disappear from view, in fact i was tracking one coming towards me and as it disappeared from view (the roof of my car being the shield) i fell asleep waiting for it to emerge the other side of my foof.

my feelings were not great excitement, i feel sure that there is an explanation for it. i was suspicious that it may all have been a hoax to excite sensitive stonehenge visitors who may be receptive to ufo suggestion. i remain with an open mind and leave it hopefully to experts to enhance my photographs and get to the bottom of it. having done a small amount of research on sightings since returning home i came accross an almost identical sighting in china this year. i think that is why i decided to report my own experience.
content.summary: Numerous bright silver lines of light, fixed length, moving different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
Witnessed 4 different objects, making short quick movements in all directions
the first one was red in color and glimmering, would make movments in all directions, noticed multiple aircraft flying in same are, all towards the object and all followed same flight pattern, weird!!

other objects were bright white and blue in color, all makeing the same short movments in all directions. i will include pics.

we are still observing these objects as of 11:15 pm, central time
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Blimp,   Bullet,   Missile,   Cylinder,   Fireball,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop
content.summary: Witnessed multiple contacts for three hours as of this report, and still observing now

content.detailedDescription:
After returning home from a social outing around 8:30 pm, just before pulling into my drive, i noticed that the sky was very clear and many stars were visible.  i walked through my house to the back yard to see if the moon was coming up as the nights have been so clear.  i stood a few minutes watching the skies toward the east.  as i watched i noticed movement and a group of star-like lights, i believe 5 in all, in the general shape of a kite or cross or arrow-head moved quickly and silently overhead and slightly to the south, moving westward.  i could see the grouping flatten as the object went past, like i was seeing it more from an edge view. in less then ten seconds it passed over and disappeared behind my two-story house.  the lights had a slight shimmer or unstable look, like they were being viewed through water or some transparent media. i checked the time and it was 8:45 according to my cell phone clock. as it passed my thoughts were that i wished it would stop or turn so i could get a better look. but it was over so fast i barely had time to take stock of what i'd seen. 
it seemed impossible to determine the precise elevation, however, i would guess that the object was between 1000 and 5000 feet from the earth. 
i am a mufon field investigator and am open to suggestions as to what this might be.  however, in my opinion, it was anomalous enough in appearance that i decided to report/document it.
content.summary: Stepped into my back yard to view the sky and saw a grouping of star-like lights move quickly and silently overhead east to west

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were on vacation visiting tombstone, arizona.  we were staying at a hotel on the north side of town.  late that afternoon, from 8:00 p. m. central standard time (? arizonia time) we were sitting behind the hotel facing west toward a mountain.  he pointed out to me an object in the sky over the mountain.  the mountain was probably two to three miles away and the object several hundred feet above the mountain.  at first he thought it was possibly a blimp.  i made three photographs.  we continued to watch it until sunset.  it appeared to be black and continued to hover in the exact same location.  he is definitely a ufo skeptic; however he did said that he knew of no plane, helicopter, or blimp that could hover like that.  he is a former army paratrooper. the next morning he went outside before i did and spotted it again.  i went with him to look.  it was in the same spot twelve to fifteen hours later.  this time to me it appeared white.  he thought it was silver.  i made several photos.  the sun was bright during the second am sighting and i could not focus.   the photos are not great. i copied and enhanced one.  enlarged it appeared to me to be shaped like a fish. we observed it for a few minutes that morning.  as we had many things to do we left the hotel.  i did look for it later that morning while visiting boothill cemetery and it was not visible.  i was anxious when i saw it and continued to be that night and the next day.  my husband did not express any anxiety.  his interest in looking for it again and the fact that he did not tell me it wasn't anything says he did think it was unusual.  the photos are attached.  i was reluctant to report it.  i have checked this site to see if anyone else did.  someone else reported a similar sighting and i decided to report ours. the photos in which the object appear black were made later afternoon.  the one with a white object in the far right corner were made mid morning the next day.
content.summary: Ufo hovering over moutain later afternoon, still there next morning

content.detailedDescription: Around 9:00pm on sat, 10/23/10, my husband and his friend were driving home from work down i-20w through austell, ga, just outside of atl. they both spotted a low-flying, slow-moving, cigar-shaped object with four lights, no wings, and no sound. since it was moving so slowly and at such a low altitude, he was able to fumble for his phone and snap a picture. neither of them had any clue to what it was, but it was apparent what it was not - not a helicopter, balloon, airplane, power-glider, etc. (to get some perspective, you can see the interstate sign and tail lights from other cars at the bottom of the pic.) he went to take another pic, and then boom! it just disappeared! any familiar aircraft takes a few minutes to fade off into the distance, and this was very slow-moving, so should have been visible for longer. nope, it just vanished! this was very confusing and they kept looking for it, but it never reappeared. they were able to compare it to airplanes which were also in the sky at a much greater altitude. the airplanes had blinking red, blue and white lights, which this did not. may not have been extraterrestrial, but sure was unexplainable.
content.summary: Cigar-shaped, very clear, low-flying, slow-moving, four lights, no wings, and then just boom! disappeared!

content.detailedDescription:
* link moved to additional evidence section below--cms/sg.

took this at june 13, 2010 around 10:00pm when noticed light outside my window.I though at first was lamp but the shape was to weird to ignore,and i couldn't see it clearly(bad eye sight)

so i took out the camera and zoomed in at it,and thought what the heck and pressed record to see if anything odd would happen..Really i thought was new lamp neighbours got..But then at around 30 secs into recording it,thing would fade out and in but i could see it still shiny from distense with my eyes and it wasent fading like it was on camera view.

also after checking the other video's i took,beside this one.What ever it was has put itself between the neighbours garage brick wall right side and my backyard fence.So its between.

also later the neighbours came outside and started pointing to the sky and talking excited about what i prasume was the beams of lights that shot down as you see in the video,i stoped recording when they came out.

also i dont think they where aware of the the other entity.I took pictures of it change shape from small ball of light to tall person,i saw it glow like sparkles while i was snapping the picture and saw it burts into light and shoot off some of its body? in the sky.


also i would prefer it with no music,but the orginal audio has to much backround sound from my family in other rooms.And i dont want there voices to be herd.
content.summary: Beams of light from the sky and enitity

content.detailedDescription: i  was sitting watching t.V when i looked out the window and i saw a oval shaped object grey and silver.It would bobble and roll as it flew,i thought it was a party balloon floating in the sky from the park down the street ,but realized it wasn't.I grabbed my video camera and i filmed the craft flying over behind my apt in my apt complex-it was 3:30pm oct 20th-2009-i was w/my friend josh.F-who eye witnessed this w/me.-the craft was flying slow,(light pole level).It would speed up then slow down-stand in place for a few seconds then keep flying.The craft flew over the gallup sports complex center where there was 3 little league baseball games going on at the time.The stadium was full of other people.The day was totally clear and sunny-the craft flew over route 602 then sped away at about 150 mph-going south /south east heading toward the gallup indian hospital(i.H.S).We made a video disk and gave the disk to ufo researcher *(name deleted--cms/sg)...(2weeks later) the craft came back during a lightning storm,flying roof top level,going back over our apt complex this time (heading west) toward i-40-going towards sander az,,the craft was perfectly round and grey-it flew between the light poles very low,,between (arnold circle and arnold by aztec st).It flew over the allsup's convenient store and kept going....I've been trying to get a copy of the disk from *(name deleted--cms/sg) since,,but haven't been able to.I did talk to him once and he said he would look for the disk i gave him.When he gives me a copy back..I will post it..I keep an eye and a camera ready at all times.Just in case it comes back.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: small grey and silver-it rolled and bobbled  (-perfectly round object)

content.detailedDescription: I shot some video footage of a us navy f18f super hornet and 2010 navy jacksonville air show ,after reviewing my footage i came across 15 seconds of video  with and object that approaches the aircraft and the exits quite quickly, no other aircraft was permitted in the area at the time of the f18 demo  i noticed a distinct triangle shape  of the object ,the object in the video appeared to move abruptly as the aircraft entered  in the frame. the object moved from the north to south then shot up as the aircraft approached it's direction.
content.summary: Air show video footage captured an object during an f18 demo

content.detailedDescription:
I went out by the pool oct 23, 2010 between 7 and 8 to have a smoke. we live in clearwater fl. and the moon was full and had just come up. it is a populated area so you could only see a handfull of stars and a planet much brighter that i think is venus. i noticed a bright star-like object overhead heading to the south. it was almost as bright as the brightest star it the sky (venus). it had no flashers and was a solid point of light remaining the same brightness until it seemed to fade to red and then vanished. i went inside to tell my girlfriend and her 2 kids. they came out to watch with me and the same type object came from the south headed northeast. same brightness and no flashing lights. it also faded to red and vanished.

two nights later, 10-25-10, i went back out armed with my video camera. at about 7:30 pm i saw it again coming from the south heading to the northeast and it remained bright like venus until it vanished in or behind some high clouds. all three cases the object stayed on a straight path at about the same speed. in the video as i follow it with the zoomed in camera, it does pass some stars so you can get an idea of the speed. there was no sound for any of the sightings.
content.summary: Star-like object over clearwater fl caught on video

content.detailedDescription: Four white "orbs?" of the eastern part of redding california (dispayed a uneven triange shape between them durning part of their air display). appeared to be white (or reflective silver) in color. they moved in a spining pattern for 2 minutes then lined up and treked slowly through the sky until reaching a simi-large cloud. after entering cloud observed for 10 more minutes, but never seen the objects exit.
content.summary: Four white (round) ufo's

content.detailedDescription:
I had just taken a pic of a mesa when i was waiting to see if i had gotten what i wanted. a dark object appeared on the left side in the led and seemed to be moving in a circular motion when all of a sudden this one object turned into many smaller ones that shot off into different directions. it may not have been moving in a circular motion but it was definitely moving enough for me to notice something. it may have appeared to be moving but it could have been the many smaller objects reflecting some type of light source instead. i did not see this until after i had snapped the pic..
we were driving through new mexico on i-40 eb when this happened. i was driving about 80 miles an hour and had my window down. i was looking north. i did look to see if the camera got any of it and it did get these smaller objects that seemed to just shoot out of the larger one. the smaller ones were gone in less than probably one second. it happened so fast. like i have tried to explain..I took a shot at the mesa in the background and in between the camera actually getting the shot and my waiting to see if the pic was in focus these things happened. i don't know how i even noticed them as fast as it happened. i feel like it wanted me to see it.
my camera is a fugi fine pix 1000.
the time and date stamp are wrong. it was taken on friday 22, 2010 at appromximately 3pm. this may have been affected because the time and date stamp were correct before this happened. i checked this before i went on my trip because i wanted it to be correct for the pics taken.
after looking at the pic it seems like this event must have come up from behind the first or closest range and i was trying to focus on the range that appears in the background.
after seeing this i felt like i had just witnessed a ufo event and was so glad that it happened to me especially while driving through n.M.
content.summary: Noticed dark object in pic just taken when it morphed into many different objects that took off in different directions
content.locationName: 309 mile marker EB I-40, New Mexico
